title: Hello world

messages.text: Hey Low, did you get your slides ready for Polymer Summit?
Who me? You know I'm always prepared early for these things.
Figures, you're a pro.  Me? Finished last night in the hotel. LOL

lastMessage: Figures, you're a pro.  Me? Finished last night in the hotel. LOL

title: Lorem ipsum

messages.text: Do you know if there's there an emoji for hot sauce?
Hmmm, dunno.  Ask the emojineer on the team, she'll know.

lastMessage: Hmmm, dunno.  Ask the emojineer on the team, she'll know.

title: Dolor sit amet

messages.text: I can't believe how easy it is to add a backend to Polymer using Firebase.  You did a killer job on that element.
Thanks, man.  I agree, it's an awesome combination.

lastMessage: Thanks, man.  I agree, it's an awesome combination.
